search_results.snippet:
Waiting for Lefty is a 1935 play by the American playwright Clifford Odets. 
Consisting of a series of related vignettes, the entire play is framed by the 
meeting of cab drivers who are planning a labor strike. The framing uses the 
audience as part of the meeting. While this was not Odets' first play, this was the 
first to be produced. ... Joe pleads that she will wake the children, but she says 
she only wants to...
